summary: Allows building using IncrediBuild, using Vim's quickfix system
name: IncrediBuild.vim
description:
This plugin allows building using IncrediBuild, using Vim's quickfix system.

See http://www.xoreax.com/main.htm for more details on IncrediBuild.
install_details:
Copy incredibuild.vim to your plugin directory.
Edit the 'USER SETTINGS' section of incredibuild.vim to your liking.
Note that IncrediBuild's executables must be in your path.
